Abstract: POST-Benjamin. On December 29, 1999. Beloved husband of Mildred. Devoted father of Jay and Roberta, Jackie and Bob, Jane and David, and Louis. Dear brother of Suki Small. Cherished grandfather of Lisa, Gail, Sarah, Alicia, Andrew, Todd, and Eric. Services Sunday, 12 noon at ''Gutterman's Inc.'', 175 Long Beach Road, Rockville Centre, L.I.
